author: cnbc.com
title: United Natural Foods to Release Fiscal 2018 Second Quarter Results on March 8, 2018
text:
PROVIDENCE, R.I.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- United Natural Foods, Inc. (Nasdaq: UNFI) (the “Company”) announced today that it will release its financial results for the second quarter of fiscal 2018, ended January 27, 2018, after market close on Thursday, March 8, 2018. Management will conduct a conference call and audio webcast at 5:00 p.m. ET on Thursday, March 8, 2018 to review the Company's results, market trends and future outlook.
The conference call dial-in number is 877-407-3982. An audio webcast of the conference call will be available to the public, on a listen-only basis, via the “Investor Overview” link on the Company's website at www.unfi.com . Please allow extra time, prior to the call, to visit the site and download the necessary software to listen to the Internet broadcast. An online archive of the webcast will be available for 30 days.
About United Natural Foods
United Natural Foods, Inc. carries and distributes more than 110,000 products to more than 43,000 customer locations throughout the United States and Canada. United Natural Foods serves a wide variety of sales channels including conventional supermarket chains, natural product superstores, independent retailers, eCommerce and food service. In 2017, United Natural Foods, Inc. was named in the “Management Top 250” list by the Wall Street Journal as one of the most effectively managed U.S. companies. For more information on United Natural Foods, Inc., visit the Company's website at www.unfi.com .
